attributes.action: Keep 5 years route to  ILR for existing skilled workers
attributes.background: Please protect current skilled workers who started their life in the UK expecting a 5-year path to ILR. Applying new settlement rules retroactively is unfair, breaks a legitimate expectation, and threatens mass departures from vital sectors . Honour existing terms and exempt current visa holders.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:

Keep 5-year ILR for Skilled Workers & dependents who come before April 2026
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/751505
